snippet: Prosecutors in the death penalty phase of the trial of Ronell Wilson showed jurors a video in which he was forcibly subdued after refusing to leave a recreation area at the Metropolitan Detention Center in Brooklyn.
abstract: Prosecutors in the death penalty phase of the trial of Ronell Wilson showed jurors a video in which he was forcibly subdued after refusing to leave a recreation area at the Metropolitan Detention Center in Brooklyn.

headline.main: Video: Detectives' Killer Is Presented as a Threat in Jail
